name: Felix Naumann
content: Information Systems | Hasso-Plattner-Institut Prof. Dr. Felix Naumann Information Systems The Research Group of Information Systems, led by Prof. Dr. Felix Naumann, is occupied with the efficient and effective handling of heterogeneous data and texts in large systems. Leitmotifs are information integration, data quality, and data analysis. Among other things, the Research Group develops methods for data profiling, data preparation and data cleansing for structured data. From textual data, particularly that from art, we extract, for example, people, places and works, as well as their relationship to each other. Prof. Dr. Felix Naumann Function Head of Information Systems Room F-2.03 Phone: +49 331 5509-280 Mail: felix.naumann@hpi.de Office Diana Stephan Office Assistant for Information Systems Phone: +49 331 5509-280 Fax: +49 331 5509-287 Mail: office-naumann@hpi.de About the research group HomeTeachingResearchPublicationsTeam Last change: 18/02/2025, Mareike-Vic Schreiber
